001package org.gbif.predicate.query;
002
003import java.util.Arrays;
004import java.util.HashSet;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Set;
007import org.elasticsearch.search.sort.FieldSortBuilder;
008import org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.search.OccurrenceSearchParameter;
009import org.gbif.api.model.predicate.GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate;
010import org.gbif.api.model.predicate.GreaterThanPredicate;
011import org.gbif.api.model.predicate.SimplePredicate;
012
013public class OccurrenceEsFieldMapperTest implements EsFieldMapper<OccurrenceSearchParameter> {
014
015  private String defaultChecklistKey = "defaultChecklistKey";
016
017  private static final Set<OccurrenceSearchParameter> TAXONOMIC_SET =
018      new HashSet<>(
019          Arrays.asList(
020              OccurrenceSearchParameter.SCIENTIFIC_NAME,
021              OccurrenceSearchParameter.VERBATIM_SCIENTIFIC_NAME,
022              OccurrenceSearchParameter.ACCEPTED_TAXON_KEY,
023              OccurrenceSearchParameter.ACCEPTED_TAXON_KEY,
024              OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXON_KEY,
025              OccurrenceSearchParameter.KINGDOM_KEY,
026              OccurrenceSearchParameter.PHYLUM_KEY,
027              OccurrenceSearchParameter.CLASS_KEY,
028              OccurrenceSearchParameter.ORDER_KEY,
029              OccurrenceSearchParameter.FAMILY_KEY,
030              OccurrenceSearchParameter.GENUS_KEY,
031              OccurrenceSearchParameter.SUBGENUS_KEY,
032              OccurrenceSearchParameter.SPECIES_KEY,
033              OccurrenceSearchParameter.IUCN_RED_LIST_CATEGORY,
034              OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXONOMIC_STATUS,
035              OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXONOMIC_ISSUE));
036
037  private static final Set<OccurrenceSearchParameter> VOCABULARY_SET =
038      new HashSet<>(
039          Arrays.asList(
040              OccurrenceSearchParameter.LIFE_STAGE,
041              OccurrenceSearchParameter.PATHWAY,
042              OccurrenceSearchParameter.DEGREE_OF_ESTABLISHMENT,
043              OccurrenceSearchParameter.ESTABLISHMENT_MEANS,
044              OccurrenceSearchParameter.EARLIEST_EON_OR_LOWEST_EONOTHEM,
045              OccurrenceSearchParameter.LATEST_EON_OR_HIGHEST_EONOTHEM,
046              OccurrenceSearchParameter.EARLIEST_ERA_OR_LOWEST_ERATHEM,
047              OccurrenceSearchParameter.LATEST_ERA_OR_HIGHEST_ERATHEM,
048              OccurrenceSearchParameter.EARLIEST_PERIOD_OR_LOWEST_SYSTEM,
049              OccurrenceSearchParameter.LATEST_PERIOD_OR_HIGHEST_SYSTEM,
050              OccurrenceSearchParameter.EARLIEST_EPOCH_OR_LOWEST_SERIES,
051              OccurrenceSearchParameter.LATEST_EPOCH_OR_HIGHEST_SERIES,
052              OccurrenceSearchParameter.EARLIEST_AGE_OR_LOWEST_STAGE,
053              OccurrenceSearchParameter.LATEST_AGE_OR_HIGHEST_STAGE));
054
055  @Override
056  public String getVerbatimFieldName(OccurrenceSearchParameter searchParameter) {
057    if (searchParameter.type() == String.class) {
058      return searchParameter.name().toLowerCase() + ".verbatim";
059    } else {
060      return searchParameter.name().toLowerCase();
061    }
062  }
063
064  @Override
065  public String getExactMatchFieldName(OccurrenceSearchParameter searchParameter) {
066    if (searchParameter.type() == String.class) {
067      return searchParameter.name().toLowerCase() + ".keyword";
068    } else {
069      return searchParameter.name().toLowerCase();
070    }
071  }
072
073  @Override
074  public String getGeoDistanceField() {
075    return "coordinates";
076  }
077
078  @Override
079  public String getGeoShapeField() {
080    return "scoordinates";
081  }
082
083  @Override
084  public String getSearchFieldName(OccurrenceSearchParameter searchParameter) {
085    return searchParameter.name();
086  }
087
088  @Override
089  public boolean isVocabulary(OccurrenceSearchParameter searchParameter) {
090    return VOCABULARY_SET.contains(searchParameter);
091  }
092
093  @Override
094  public boolean isTaxonomic(OccurrenceSearchParameter searchParameter) {
095    return TAXONOMIC_SET.contains(searchParameter);
096  }
097
098  @Override
099  public String getChecklistField(String checklistKey, OccurrenceSearchParameter searchParameter) {
100
101    if (searchParameter == OccurrenceSearchParameter.SCIENTIFIC_NAME) {
102      return "classifications."
103          + (checklistKey != null ? checklistKey : defaultChecklistKey)
104          + ".usage.name";
105    }
106
107    return "classifications."
108        + (checklistKey != null ? checklistKey : defaultChecklistKey)
109        + ".taxonKeys";
110  }
111
112  @Override
113  public String getNestedPath(OccurrenceSearchParameter param) {
114    if (param.name().startsWith("HUMBOLDT_")) {
115      return "event.humboldt";
116    }
117    return null;
118  }
119
120  @Override
121  public String getFullTextField() {
122    return "all";
123  }
124
125  @Override
126  public List<FieldSortBuilder> getDefaultSort() {
127    return List.of();
128  }
129
130  @Override
131  public boolean includeNullInPredicate(SimplePredicate<OccurrenceSearchParameter> predicate) {
132    return predicate.getKey() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.DISTANCE_FROM_CENTROID_IN_METERS
133        && (predicate instanceof GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate
134            || predicate instanceof GreaterThanPredicate);
135  }
136
137  @Override
138  public EsField getEsField(OccurrenceSearchParameter parameter) {
139    return null;
140  }
141
142  @Override
143  public EsField getEsFacetField(OccurrenceSearchParameter parameter) {
144    return null;
145  }
146
147  @Override
148  public boolean isDateField(EsField esField) {
149    return false;
150  }
151
152  @Override
153  public EsField getGeoDistanceEsField() {
154    return null;
155  }
156
157  @Override
158  public EsField getGeoShapeEsField() {
159    return null;
160  }
161}
